INSERT INTO `t_user_remind` (`user_id`, `type`, `type_id`, `advance_date`, `advance_day`, `remind_date`) SELECT u.id user_id , 2 type , cf.id type_id , ${userRemindBean.advanceDate} advance_date , ${userRemindBean.advanceDay} advance_day , cf.birthday remind_date FROM t_customer_family cf
INNER JOIN t_customer c ON cf.customer_id = c.id AND c.is_delete = 0 INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.user_id = u.id AND u.is_delete = 0

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
